remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要定義儲存格時，指定的。To define a for a cell, specify a of . A可以套用至資料格在資料表、 資料行或儲存格層級。A can be applied to a cell at the table, column, or cell level. 若要套用資料行中的所有資料格，設定屬性，會優先於屬性。To apply a to all cells in a column, set the property, which takes precedence over the property. 若要套用個別資料格，以設定屬性直接在物件，會優先於所有其他您套用至資料格的樣式。To apply a to an individual cell, set the property directly on the object, which takes precedence over all other styles that you apply to the cell.

summary.span: Gets or sets the display position of the column relative to the other columns in the .

span.span: Gets or sets the display position of the column relative to the other columns in the .

value.span: 資料行，因為它的以零為起始的位置會顯示於相關聯。

span.span: The zero-based position of the column, as it is displayed in the associated .

value.span: 已註冊的預設值為-1。

span.span: The registered default is -1.

value.span: 什麼可能會影響該值的相關資訊，請參閱。

span.span: For information about what can influence the value, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性具有預設值是-1 之前它就會加入,集合。The property has a default value of -1 before it is added to the collection. 加入資料行時，會更新這個值。This value is updated when the column is added to the . 要求每個資料行的屬性必須是唯一的整數，從 0 到的-1。The requires that the property of each column must be a unique integer from 0 to the of -1. 因此，當一個資料行變更的變更通常會導致也可以變更其他資料行。Therefore, when the of one column changes, the change typically causes the of other columns to also change. 限制值會強制執行機制。The restrictions on the value are enforced by a mechanism. 如果您嘗試設定不正確的值時，會擲回執行階段例外狀況。If you attempt to set a value that is not valid, a run-time exception is thrown. 當值屬性變更，就會引發事件。When the value of the property is changed, the event is raised.

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。

value.span: 什麼可能會影響該值的相關資訊，請參閱。

span.span: For information about what can influence the value, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來設定中個別資料行。Use this property to set the for an individual column in the . 若要定義拖曳指標，指定的。To define a for the drag indicator, specify a of . 您可以變更某些項目拖曳指標，例如資料行標頭框線外觀樣式中設定屬性。You can set properties in the style to change the appearance of certain elements of the drag indicator, such as the border around the column header. 不過，會使用預設範本，拖曳指標來繪製原始被拖曳的資料行標頭的映像。However, the default template for the drag indicator uses a to paint a with an image of the original column header that is being dragged. 如此一來，如果您某些屬性中設定您的風格，例如或，它們將會顯示未套用。As a result, if you set some properties in your style, such as or , they will appear to not be applied. 若要變更資料行標頭的外觀，被拖曳的期間，會套用新的範本不使用預設。To change the appearance of the column header while it is being dragged, apply a new template that does not use the default .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要定義資料行標頭，指定的。To define a for a column header, specify a of . A可以套用到所有的資料行標題，或個別的資料行標頭。A can be applied to all column headers or to an individual column header. 若要套用至個別的標頭，設定屬性，會優先於屬性。To apply a to an individual header, set the property, which takes precedence over the property. ## Examples 下列範例會使用樣式資源來變更資料行中的標頭的樣式。The following example uses a style resource to change the style of column headers in the . 第一個資料行標頭的樣式會與內嵌樣式會覆寫設定。The style of the first column header is then set with an inline style that overrides the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能用於凍結資料行。 cannot be used to freeze a column. 相反地，設定屬性。Instead, set the property. 最左邊的資料行，直到指定的資料行就地將凍結的數目。The leftmost columns up to the column that is specified by the number will freeze in place. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從選取 「 凍結資料行 」 時凍結資料行。The following example shows how to freeze a column when "Freeze Column" is selected from the . 若要凍結的資料行中包含資料行移到左邊。Columns are moved to the left in order to be included in the frozen columns. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性`true`來將個別的資料行中的所有資料格為唯讀。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in an individual column read-only. 設定屬性`true`進行的所有資料格唯讀狀態。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in the read-only. 設定屬性`true`來將個別資料格為唯讀。Set the property to `true` to make an individual cell read-only. 如果層級設定之間發生衝突，資料行或資料格層級，值為`true`值的優先順序高於`false`。If a conflict exists between the settings at the , column, or cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個所選資料格來擷取預設儲存格內容會呼叫這個方法。This method is called for each selected cell to retrieve the default cell content. 然後引發事件。It then raises the event. 您可以處理傳回之前，修改儲存格內容的事件。You can handle the event to modify the cell content before it is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來當作 helper 如果提供的自訂貼上實作。This method can be used as a helper if you provide a custom paste implementation for the . 儲存格內容都儲存在`item`物件。The cell content is stored in the `item` object. 這個方法會引發事件。This method raises the event. 您可以處理之前貼入資料格修改儲存格內容的事件。You can handle the event to modify the cell content before it is pasted into the cell. 您可以設定`cellContent`至`null`取消貼上動作。You can set `cellContent` to `null` to cancel the paste action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件處理常式可以修改剪貼簿內容，才能取得儲存在儲存格內容中。Event handlers can modify the clipboard content before it gets stored in the cell content.
